Pet_Food.name: Cardio Support
Calibra Cat Sterilised Turkey with Cranberries and Salmon Oil
Pet_Food.body:
Calibra Cat Sterilised Turkey with Cranberries and Salmon Oil

Complete canned meat food for neutered cats

User Friendly for Cats with sensitive digestive systems

Features
  • Clean uncontaminated sample
  • Safe & Economical
  • Non invasive
  • Natural & Biodegradable
  • Veterinarian recommended
Contents and Packing
  • Kit includes Hydrophobhic sand, Disposal tray, Vial, Pipette and disposing bag
  • 1x300g sand x 1vial x 1 pipette x 1 disposal tray
Instructions for use

Spread all of the sand into a clean and empty litter tray, and let the cat freely urinate onto the sand. The cat’s urine will stay on the top allowing you to collect the urine using the pipette and vial that is included into the kit. The entire content of one bag is require to collect a single urine sample. If required, use more than one bag of sand.

Pet_Food.name: Calibra Dog Hypoallergenic Adult Large Breed / Chicken & Rice
Pet_Food.body:
Calibra Dog Hypoallergenic Adult Large Breed / Chicken & Rice

Complete dry food for large breed (over 30kg) adult dogs

User Friendly adult large and giant dog breeds weighing over 30kg

Features
  • Highly digestible hypoallergic recipe(0% wheat, 0% soy, 0% maize)
  • Extra joint nutrition to protect the musculoskeletal system of large breeds
  • Salmon oil as a source of omega-3 unsaturated fatty acids for healthy skin and coat
Contents and Packing
  • Kit includes Hydrophobhic sand, Disposal tray, Vial, Pipette and disposing bag
  • 1x300g sand x 1vial x 1 pipette x 1 disposal tray
Instructions for use

Spread all of the sand into a clean and empty litter tray, and let the cat freely urinate onto the sand. The cat’s urine will stay on the top allowing you to collect the urine using the pipette and vial that is included into the kit. The entire content of one bag is require to collect a single urine sample. If required, use more than one bag of sand.

Pet_Food.name: Calibra Dog Hypoallergenic Adult Medium Breed / Lamb & Rice
Pet_Food.body:
Calibra Dog Hypoallergenic Adult Medium Breed / Lamb & Rice

Complete dry food for medium breed (10-30kg) adult dogs

User Friendly for adult large weighing between 10 and 30kg

Features
  • High lamb meat content, low grain content (only rice)
  • Highly digestible hypoallergenic recipe(0% wheat,0% soy, 0% maize)
  • Salmon oil as a source of omega-3 unsaturated fatty acids for healthy skin and coat
Contents and Packing
  • Kit includes Hydrophobhic sand, Disposal tray, Vial, Pipette and disposing bag
  • 1x300g sand x 1vial x 1 pipette x 1 disposal tray
Instructions for use

The cat’s urine will stay on the top allowing you to collect the urine using the pipette and vial that is included into the kit. The entire content of one bag is require to collect a single urine sample. If required, use more than one bag of sand.

Medical_Devices.name: Pet identification Chip
Medical_Devices.body:
Pet identification Chip

One implant for lifetime, provides ownership proof

HS pet identification chip is ready to use application system (RFID) with unique 15-digit number for the electronic identification of animals. It is manufactured in accordance to ISO standard 11784/85 FDX B and accepted globally.

Features
  • Absolutely safe with no side effects
  • Anti-migration coating and painless insertion process
  • Provides unique Lifetime ID
  • Can’t be lost or altered
  • No Geographical boundaries
Contents and Packing
  • Kit includes Hydrophobhic sand, Disposal tray, Vial, Pipette and disposing bag
  • 1x300g sand x 1vial x 1 pipette x 1 disposal tray
Instructions for use

Spread all of the sand into a clean and empty litter tray, and let the cat freely urinate onto the sand. The cat’s urine will stay on the top allowing you to collect the urine using the pipette and vial that is included into the kit. The entire content of one bag is require to collect a single urine sample. If required, use more than one bag of sand.

Medical_Devices.name: Microchip Ring Reader
Medical_Devices.body:
Microchip Ring Reader

Scanner is versatile, reads all FDX-B 15 digit and FDX A (FECAVA) 10 digit microchips (all brands), It is in compliance with ROHS, CE and ISO 11784 norms, convenient and portable scanner, Ergonomically designed, Lightweight, robust to use and rechargeable via a USB cable to laptop or PC

Features
  • In compliance with ROHS, CE and ISO 11784 norms
  • Ergonomically designed
  • Lightweight and robust
  • Rechargeable via a USB cable to laptop or PC
Technical details
  • In compliance with ROHS, CE and ISO 11784 norms
  • Ergonomically designed
  • Lightweight and robust
  • Rechargeable via a USB cable to laptop or PC
Contents and Packing
  • Dimensions: 135mm diameter x 33mm
  • Weight: 163g
  • Scans per charge: 8 second scans x 1000
  • Standby Time: 2 months (typically)
  • 3 hours charge time
  • LCD 2 lines x 16 characters display

Medical_Devices.name: Hot and Cold Pack
Medical_Devices.body:
Hot and Cold Pack

Reusable and convenient pack for Dual purpose therapy

Applications
  • Cold pack is generally recommended for first 48 hours following injury. Relieves inflammation, swelling and pain
  • Hot pack is generally recommended 48 hours after injury. Improves flexibility of tendons, ligaments, reduce muscle spasm and alleviate pain.
  • Can be used at multiple sites (Knee, thigh, hip, back, shoulder, neck etc.)
  • Economical and easy method
  • Suitable for continuous treatment, if needed
Contents and Packing
  • 1X1 unit
Implantation sites

The implantation sites in Canines and Felines are

  • The Transponder is implanted subcutaneous on the dorsal midline just cranial to the shoulder blades or scapula
  • The Transponder is implanted subcutaneously in the midway region of left neck

Medical_Devices.name: Feline Urine Collection kit
Medical_Devices.body:
Feline Urine Collection kit

Feline urine collection kit is a unique hydrophobic sand with biodegradable and safe coating.

User Friendly for Cats, Pet owners, Vets and Technicians

Features
  • Clean uncontaminated sample
  • Safe & Economical
  • Non invasive
  • Natural & Biodegradable
  • Veterinarian recommended
Contents and Packing
  • Kit includes Hydrophobhic sand, Disposal tray, Vial, Pipette and disposing bag
  • 1x300g sand x 1vial x 1 pipette x 1 disposal tray
Instructions for use

Spread all of the sand into a clean and empty litter tray, and let the cat freely urinate onto the sand. The cat’s urine will stay on the top allowing you to collect the urine using the pipette and vial that is included into the kit. The entire content of one bag is require to collect a single urine sample. If required, use more than one bag of sand.

Medical_Devices.name: Bandages
Medical_Devices.body:
Hot and Cold Pack
Prowrap Bandage Usage
  • Cohesive bandages
  • Holding dressings in place
  • Easy to tear
  • Water resistant
  • Allow skin to breathe
  • Hold wound dressings in place
  • Provides compression for healing after surgery
  • Support the joints to avoid sprains and strains
  • Individually wrapped
  • Colors available- multiple
  • 5, 7.5 cm, 10 cm
Proplast Bandage Usage
  • Adhesive bandage
  • Strong level of adhesion with minimum residue
  • Strong adhesive
  • Provides compression for healing after surgery
  • Support the joints to avoid sprains and strains
  • Individually wrapped
  • Colors available
  • White

Catheter.name: Cat Catheter
Catheter.body:
Cat Catheter

Urinal catheters for cats with and without stylet made from polyethylene with luer fitting.

Hair_Ball_Remover.name: Cat Laxative
Hair_Ball_Remover.body:
Cat Laxative
Indications for Use

Hairball removal and prevention

Applications

Most cats will take the laxative directly from the tube or from your finger, alternatively place the cat laxative on to the front paw or on the nozzle where the cat can lick it off.

To prevent hairballs:

Kittens (over 6 months): 3-6mm (0.12-0.24in) weekly, Cats: 6-13mm (0.24-0.5in) weekly

To remove hairballs:

Kittens (over 6 months): 13mm (0.5in) daily for 3 days, Cats: 25mm (1in) daily for 3 days.

Skin_Care_Range.name: Soft coat
Skin_Care_Range.body:
Soft coat

It is a scientifically designed feed supplement with a blend of omega 6 and omega 3 fatty acids in the ratio of 10:1 along with vitamins, antioxidants and essential oils

Dietary supplement for smooth skin and shiny hair coat. Shiny hair coat and skin status reflects a healthy pet. It is a scientifically designed feed supplement with a blend of omega 6 and omega 3 fatty acids in the ratio of 10:1 along with vitamins, antioxidants and essential oils.

Features
  • Fish Oils like Salmon, Mackerel and Red Snapper Oil rich in omega 3 fatty acid makes coat brighter and shiner
  • Curcumin extract reduces inflammation and helps in tissue repair
  • Vitamin A, Biotin and Zinc assists in strengthening the Ceramide layer of Skin reducing Trans Epidermal water loss (TEWL) increasing Skin Immunit
  • Evening Primrose oil useful to relive Allergic Dermatitis and Boost immune system
Benefits
  • Is ideal supplement for management of Allergic Dermatitis
  • Is ideal supplement for preventing hair fall and dandruff
  • Is ideal supplement for recovery during Tick-Flea treatment
  • It can be recommended as supportive therapy during bacterial and fungal therapy
  • It is a daily supplement for overall improvement in Q.O.L of dogs and cats
Instructions for use

Given orally or Mix in daily food

For dogs and Cats

0.5ml/kg b wt./day or as advised by veterinarian

Skin_Care_Range.name: Allergia
Skin_Care_Range.body:
Allergia
Features
  • Provide relief from itching, scratching, gnawing and chewing
  • Helps provide relief for pets with seasonal allergies
  • Helps reliefs discomfort from skin rashes and hot spots in skin
  • Relieves distress associated with sneezing, runny nose, watery eyes
  • It has convenient dosing, natural & palatable flavor
Packing

1 X 30 Tabs

Instructions for use
  • It is given orally or Mix in daily food
  • Upto 5 kgs -1/2 tab twice daily
  • One tablet twice daily per 10 kg body weight
  • Or as advised by Veterinarian

Skin_Care_Range.body:
Vetramail Oinment
Features
  • Bitter taste
  • Insect repellent
  • Anti-fungal and anti-bacterial
  • Promotes wound healing
